College of Education SACSCOC Data Resources
Results will measure the performance of beginning teachers, and

The results will measure the program’s effectiveness in preparing program participants to succeed in the classroom. The program participant exit survey will measure the educator preparation program’s effectiveness in preparing participants to succeed in the classroom.
table_data: Candidates(Updated 2021)
Number of candidates enrolled in the ASU Educator Preparation Program for a given academic year sorted by certification program.
Finishers (Initial Certification)(Updated 2021)

Finishers as defined by the Accountability System for Educator Preparation are those candidates who have finished an Educator Preparation Program. Finishers include undergraduates who have received degrees in the completion year as well as post-baccalaureates who have finished the certification program requirements.
Unit Accreditation Pass Rates(Updated 2021)
Overall pass rates used for accreditation purposes by the State Board for Educator Certification(SBEC).
Certification Test Pass Rate(Updated 2021)Previous Pass RatesCurrent Pass Rates
Certification test pass rates used for accreditation purposes by the State Board for Educator Certification (SBEC).
Effects on Student Learning Rubric
The Effects on Student Learning Rubric is used in the evaluation of student teachers.
Effects on Student Learning AssessmentExample (Spring 2022 EOSL)
Summary of Effects on Student Learning.
Secondary Teaching Demo Rubric
Rubric used to assess a 30-minute lesson presented by the student as a culminating activity in the planning process.
Secondary Lesson Plan Rubric
Rubric used as guidelines by students in the lesson planning process.

TEA Principal SurveyTEA Principal Survey 2013-2014TEA Principal Survey 2014-2015TEA Principal Survey 2015-2016TEA Principal Survey 2016-2017TEA Principal Survey 2017-2018TEA Principal Survey 2018-2019TEA Principal Survey 2019-2020TEA Principal Survey 2020-2021

Senate Bill (SB) 174, passed by the 81st Texas Legislature, and the Texas Administrative Code (TAC) Chapter 229, Accountability System for Educator Preparation includes four accountability standards. Standard two will be met by the distribution of a Principal Survey that will serve two purposes:Results will measure the performance of beginning teachers, andThe results will measure the program’s effectiveness in preparing program participants to succeed in the classroom. The program participant exit survey will measure the educator preparation program’s effectiveness in preparing participants to succeed in the classroom.
TEA Status Letter 2022
This letter details the results of the compliance review performed by the Texas Education Agency Division of Educator Standards in 2016.

Candidate EPP Completion SurveyCandidate EPP Completion Survey Fall 2019Candidate EPP Completion Survey Spring 2020Candidate EPP Completion Survey Fall 2020Candidate EPP Completion Survey Spring 2021Candidate EPP Completion Survey Fall 2021Candidate EPP Completion Survey Spring 2022
This is a survey taken by candidates completing the Educator Preparation Program. Candidates provide feedback on their training at ASU.

TEA Candidate Exit SurveyTEA Candidate Exit Survey 2015-2016TEA Candidate Exit Survey 2016-2017TEA Candidate Exit Survey 2017-2018TEA Candidate Exit Survey 2018-2019TEA Candidate Exit Survey 2019-2020TEA Candidate Exit Survey 2020-2021
Survey administered by the Texas Education Agency to all candidates completing an Educator Preparation Program.

Higher Education Act Report 2008-2009Higher Education Act Report 2009-2010Higher Education Act Report 2010-2011Higher Education Act Report 2011-2012Higher Education Act Report 2012-2013Higher Education Act Report 2013-2014Higher Education Act Report 2014-2015Higher Education Act Report 2015-2016Higher Education Act Report 2016-2017Higher Education Act Report 2017-2018Higher Education Act Report 2018-2019Higher Education Act Report 2019-2020Higher Education Act Report 2020-2021

The Higher Education Act of 2008 requires all Educator Preparation Programs to provide certification pass rates, demographics, and other information to the general public. This is a copy of the report for Angelo State University.
District Demographics (Sample)
Sample of district demographics for the campuses that ASU places candidates for field experience in initial, advanced programs.
